strings.Value: [Use dispel magic to free the hostages] "I've lifted the enchantment! You're free!"
[Attack the lumberjacks] "I think it would be easier to just kill you."
"I believe I was promised compensation for my efforts."
[Attack Melianse] "Fine, let's settle this another way. To arms!"
{n}The lumberjack curses under his breath.{/n} "Gods, what a waste... Why'd you bend over backwards for that toad? Should've hung her from a tree, let her dry out some!"
"So, you get those feathers yet? Best hurry — who knows what that damned snake's got on her mind?"
"That's more like it! Come on, people! Let's smash that toad's face in!"
"Here, for you. Forgive me, but I can't give any more — we need something to give to the families of the deceased."
"I never go back on my word! Take this. Thank you for helping us!"
{n}The lumberjack hangs his head.{/n} "You didn't save them. What do I tell the widows? How can I look the orphans in the eyes?"
"Well, thank you kindly! I was already thinking there was going to be blood."
